frontmatter.name: swFlangeOffsetTypes_e
frontmatter.description: End conditions for both flange length and flange position offset for sheet metal edge and base flanges.

title: swFlangeOffsetTypes_e
description: End conditions for both flange length and flange position offset for sheet metal edge and base flanges.

values.description: = Positions the edge flange based on the length and direction you specify
= Creates the edge flange in a multibody part by merging a selected edge on one body with an Up To reference edge on the second body

= Positions the edge flange up to a specified vertex; for flange length, the selected vertex may be either on a plane that is normal to the end face of the edge flange or on a plane that is parallel to the face of the base flange
